test.name: Test!
test.text: This is some testing text to ensure that all goes well when displaying text!

test.name: Test2!
test.text:
This is some more text, this one can be skipped; however,
 try it out and make sure it works :)

periodic_table.name: Periodic Table
periodic_table.text: It's the Periodic Table of the Elements.

puzzle1_door.name: Door
puzzle1_door.text: The door is locked, but there's a keypad here to input numbers on

puzzle1_door_success.name: Door
puzzle1_door_success.text: You hear a loud click and a beep as the door unlocks

puzzle1_door_failure.name: Door
puzzle1_door_failure.text:
You hear a failure beep from the keypad as nothing happens.
That must be the wrong code.

puzzle2_note.name: Note
puzzle2_note.text:
I can't believe our work has been so successful!
My one concern is it's been slightly too successful, we'll need to find a way
to keep the ginger under control. I've found that pouring bleach on them
does make them shrivel a bit, it's a start

get_bleach.name: Drawer
get_bleach.text:
You open the drawer and find a bottle of bleach inside.
How convienient.

ginger_weird.name: Drake
ginger_weird.text:
Is that... ginger?
Whatever it is it's in my way.

ginger_failed.name: Drake
ginger_failed.text: That... did nothing, back to the drawing board

ginger_broken_down.name: Drake
ginger_broken_down.text: Woah! That's really effective, now I can get through here

fire_axe.name: Drake
fire_axe.text: Looks like there used to be a fire axe in here

tree_comment.name: Drake
tree_comment.text: Maybe I can get some wood to cover the gap from this?

tree_failure.name: Drake
tree_failure.text: I don't think this will help.

tree_success.name: Game
tree_success.text:
You managed to chop off two decent planks of wood, going for the third
you swung too hard, accidentally throwing your axe into the pit.

planks_comment.name: Drake
planks_comment.text: Maybe I can put something across this gap?

planks_failed.name: Drake
planks_failed.text: That's not going to help me out.

planks_success.name: Drake
planks_success.text: Nice! They're long enough, now here's hoping they'll hold me

bulletin_board1.name: Board
bulletin_board1.text:
Memo : Please stop hiding your sensitive lock codes in little "puzzles".
It's not funny, and It's a security risk.

microwave1.name: Drake
microwave1.text:
A Microwave; someone didn't reset the timer, though.
It's still set at 2:47

locker_room_door.name: Door
locker_room_door.text: The door is locked, but there's a keypad here to input numbers on

locker_room_door_success.name: Door
locker_room_door_success.text: You hear a loud click and a beep as the door unlocks

locker_room_door_failure.name: Door
locker_room_door_failure.text:
You hear a failure beep from the keypad as nothing happens.
That must be the wrong code.

head_office_door_comment.name: Drake
head_office_door_comment.text:
The door is locked, this handle looks weak though, heh,
I could probably melt it!

head_office_door_success.name: Door
head_office_door_success.text:
You pour the scalding coffee onto the door knob, and, to your suprise:
It melts right off, the door opens.

head_office_door_failure.name: Drake
head_office_door_failure.text: This isn't going to help break the door knob

sector_b_door_comment.name: Drake
sector_b_door_comment.text: This door is labeled "Sector B". I need a keycard to get in here.

sector_b_door_failure.name: Door
sector_b_door_failure.text: Unfortunately, this item will not work, as it does not fit in the reader.

sector_b_door_success.name: Door
sector_b_door_success.text: Swiping the keycard in the reader unlocks and opens the door.

sector_a_door_comment.name: Drake
sector_a_door_comment.text: This door is labeled "Sector A". I need a keycard to get in here.

sector_a_door_failure.name: Door
sector_a_door_failure.text: Unfortunately, this item will not work, as it does not fit in the reader.

sector_a_door_success.name: Door
sector_a_door_success.text: Swiping the keycard in the reader unlocks and opens the door.

cabinet1_comment.name: Drake
cabinet1_comment.text: The drawer seems locked, there must be a key around here somewhere

cabinet1_failure.name: Drawer
cabinet1_failure.text: This item is not the key

cabinet1_success.name: Drawer
cabinet1_success.text:
You insert the key into the hole and hear a click as you
turn it, letting you open the drawer.

rusty_key_note.name: Note
rusty_key_note.text:
I'm leaving the key here since someone locked up the Lab again.
Please remember, someone, to put this in the vat of vinegar back there.
I can't get my coffee without the thing being clean, the lock's too tight

break_room_door_comment.name: Drake
break_room_door_comment.text: The door to the break room, it's locked though, I'll have to get the key.

break_room_door_failure.name: Door
break_room_door_failure.text: This thing won't fit in the keyhole

break_room_door_success.name: Door
break_room_door_success.text:
You insert the key into the hole and hear a click as you
turn it, letting you open the door.

guard_door_comment.name: Drake
guard_door_comment.text:
This leads to the guard point for the Lab, if
I get in there I may be able to open the doors!

guard_door_failure.name: Door
guard_door_failure.text: This is not the correct keycard

guard_door_success.name: Door
guard_door_success.text:
Swiping the card sucessfully presents a cheery beeping
noise followed by the door opening.

vinegar_comment.name: Drake
vinegar_comment.text:
That is a large vat of vinegar, there's a lable on the side that reads:
"NOT FOR HUMAN CONSUMPTION"

vinegar_failure.name: Drake
vinegar_failure.text: I don't see how dipping this in vinegar could possibly help.

vinegar_success.name: Vinegar
vinegar_success.text:
You dip the rusty key in, removing the rust. It comes out golden again.
(We're ignoring the fact that it's iron that rusts, okay?)

vinegar_door.name: Door
vinegar_door.text: The door is locked, but there's a keypad here to input numbers on

vinegar_door_success.name: Door
vinegar_door_success.text: The door makes a good sounding kind of beep before opening.

vinegar_door_failure.name: Door
vinegar_door_failure.text: The door makes a bad sounding kind of beep before not opening.

note_hint_2.name: Drawer
note_hint_2.text: You notice there's a note in this drawer.

note_hint_2.name: Note
note_hint_2.text:
I feel like these notes clearly violate the security memo.
Anyways, second digit is double 4

note_hint_3.name: Note
note_hint_3.text:
Why was I asked to write this?
Digit three is the same as digit one

note_hint_4.name: Note
note_hint_4.text:
Exclusively Ron thought this was a good idea.
Digit four is a 1

note_hint_5.name: Board
note_hint_5.text: There's a note pinned to the board.

note_hint_5.name: Note
note_hint_5.text:
I think this is a lovely idea, to hell with Security!.
Digit five is 0

   -Signed Ron

make_coffee.name: Coffee
make_coffee.text: You use the coffee machine to make a very hot cup of coffee.

stuck_door.name: Door
stuck_door.text: This door appears to be firmly stuck in place.

bleach_directions.name: Note
bleach_directions.text:
We have simplified the process of making bleach.
Take equal parts of all A-D Chemicals and place
Them inside the Bleachinator Machine
In the back of our clean room.

Oh! This weeks clean room pin is 1 after time

clean_room_door.name: Door
clean_room_door.text: The door is locked, but there's a keypad here to input numbers on

clean_room_door_success.name: Door
clean_room_door_success.text: The door makes a good sounding kind of beep before opening.

clean_room_door_failure.name: Door
clean_room_door_failure.text: The door makes a bad sounding kind of beep before not opening.

chem_a_locker.name: Locker
chem_a_locker.text:
You swing open the doors of the locker,
finding several jars labeled "Chemical A"

You take one.

knife_locker.name: Locker
knife_locker.text: This locker is mostly empty save for a knife

box1_comment.name: Drake
box1_comment.text:
A package? Shaking it around I can hear something
heavy inside; though maybe I should stop
shaking packages in chemical storage

box1_failure.name: Drake
box1_failure.text: I can't see how this item can help me here.

box1_success.name: Box
box1_success.text:
You cut the box open to reveal a hammer and absolute
loads of packing materials

chem_b_locker_comment.name: Drake
chem_b_locker_comment.text:
It's...? Welded shut, I'll need to smash it
to even try to open it.

chem_b_locker_failure.name: Drake
chem_b_locker_failure.text: This item really won't help me open the locker.

chem_b_locker_success.name: Locker
chem_b_locker_success.text:
Hitting the weld a few times with the hammer worked
freeing it enough to open up and reveal several jars
of Chemical B.

chem_room_door.name: Door
chem_room_door.text: The door is locked, but there's a keypad here to input numbers on

chem_room_door_failure.name: Door
chem_room_door_failure.text: The door buzzes an obnoxious tone before doing nothing.

chem_room_door_success.name: Door
chem_room_door_success.text: The door buzzes a nice tone before opening.

chem_puzzle_note.name: Note
chem_puzzle_note.text:
This note has clearly been redone serveral times based on
the scratched out text.

It now just reads "B3HN"

safe_comment.name: Drake
safe_comment.text: It appears to be a safe.

safe_failure.name: Drake
safe_failure.text: This item can't get me into the safe.

safe_success.name: Safe
safe_success.text:
Pouring some corrosive on the hinges made them weak enough to give.

And there were some jars of Chemical D in here!

bleachinator_comment.name: Safe
bleachinator_comment.text:
"The Bleachinator"? I Guess this is where I'll have to put
my chemicals.

bleachinator_failure.name: Safe
bleachinator_failure.text:
I don't think putting this item in there
is a good idea.

end_note.name: Note
end_note.text:
To Whom it May Concern:

   It would be in your greatest interest, seeing
as you are reading this note, to run.

                           - Sincerely, Dr. Steinfurth

tutorial_door_comment.name: Door
tutorial_door_comment.text:
This is a door, it requires a keycard so open your inventory
[TAB] and double click the keycard you picked up.
Then interact with this door again.

tutorial_door_success.name: Door
tutorial_door_success.text:
The keycard opened the door with its mere presence...

inside the card reader.
